price: Istina je, sigurno, da će se stanovnici Džehennema među sobom raspravljati.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
